snippet: The decision by Gary L. Ackerman, a longtime member of Congress who represents Queens and Long Island, is an unexpected development that brings a colorful political career to an end.
abstract: The decision by Gary L. Ackerman, a longtime member of Congress who represents Queens and Long Island, is an unexpected development that brings a colorful political career to an end.

headline.main: Ackerman Won't Seek Re-Election to Congress
headline.print_headline: Surprising Colleagues, Ackerman Says He Will Not Seek a 16th Term in the House
